scripts.start: node index.js && cd client && npm start
scripts.push:git: git add . && git commit && git push
scripts.deploy:subtree: cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part-3/phonebook/ heroku master
scripts.deploy: npm run push:git && npm run set:remote && npm run deploy:subtree
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: rm -rf build && npm run build-client && npm run copy-static-assets
